summary:
THIS MOD IS IS STILL VERY MUCH A WORK IN PROGRESS!!!

A dungeon filled with mannequins, chests, and display cases for you to store and display all of your gear. Includes a bedroom area, forge, and alchemy/enchanting tower.

Next update will include a huge cavern alchemy garden!
descriptionHtml:
IF UPGRADING FROM v1a TO v1.1, MAKE SURE YOU REMOVE ALL ITEMS YOU DO NOT WANT TO LOSE FROM THE DUNGEON!!! You will NOT have to do this for future updates. When it asks you if you would like to update, click yes.

Basically this is a place for you to store all your gear, by putting it on display and making it look pretty! Also includes a bedroom area and forge. Hope you enjoy! I plan on adding other necessities as the mod progresses! 

Please endorse if you like it!

Also, please let me know if there is anything you would like added, or if you have any tips, as this is my first time using the Creation Kit, i\'m sure there are lots of improvements I could make.

CHANGES IN VERSION 1_2

-Added Enchanting/Alchemy Tower
-Removed redundant lights
-Fixed Spiderwebbing (Blue Cracks) issue in display room
-Added some static items
-Fixed disappearing display cases

CHANGES IN VERSION 1_1

-Added bedroom area  
-Added forge  
-Removed some unnecessary torches  
-Fixed Flickering lighting on mannequins  
-Fixed bugged shadows on mannequins  

NOTE: If anyone knows how to equip armor on mannequins from the creation kit, please let me know!
author: Sean Grey Wylde
